<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Plant Whisperer](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=236)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 29 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

</column>

You've always had a green thumb, allowing you to care for plants that others found too difficult to grow and tend with a skill that borders on the magical. As you travel, you encounter all sorts of new plants and plant creatures, allowing you to expand your horizons and deepen your understanding of flora.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Wisdom
or Charisma, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) skill, and the [Plant Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Natural Medicine](/Feats.aspx?ID=815) skill feat.
name: Plant Whisperer
